definitions.definition: An event which may or may not happen; that which is unforeseen, undetermined, or dependent on something future.
That which falls to one in a division or apportionment among a number; a suitable share.
Possible or liable, but not certain to occur.
(with upon or on) Dependent on something that is undetermined or unknown.
definitions.example: The success of his undertaking is contingent upon events which he cannot control.

definitions.definition: Dependent on something that may or may not occur.
Not logically necessarily true or false.
